mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by rr.pay_num) num, rr.pay_num payNum, rr.room_res_status roomResStatus, r.room_rank_name || ' | ' || r.bed_cnt || ' ' || r.bed_name || ' | ' || r.view_name room, rr.checkin checkIn, rr.checkout checkOut, rr.room_res_date roomResDate, m.eng_fname || ' ' || m.eng_lname engName, rr.guest_phone guestPhone from room_reservation rr, room r, member m where rr.room_id = r.room_id and rr.user_id = m.member_id order by payNum
